skills.name: SOLAR WITNESS
desc: • Deals 3 hits of random damage to all enemies.
• 30% Chance to apply Permadeath for 1 turn.

skills.name: HAND OF FATE
desc: • Remove Negative Effects from an ally.
• Heal the ally for 30% of their MAX HP.
• Grants an Extra Turn to the ally.
• An Extra Turn will let a character attack again if they’ve already acted that turn.

skills.name: LIFE AFTER DEATH
desc: Instantly Revive Self with 60% HP upon death.
